channel.title: Dummies help please!
channel.description:
Ok so i was wondering how do i make one portal go to a pvp world for example i want a portal in the bank and when u click portal it chages the world to a pvp world and a second portal when u click it it goes back to regular non pvp. does anyone noh ow i can do that?
Ok you no in varrok training were the dummys and haybayes are i was wondering how do i make it were when you attak the dummy it gives you melee xp and when u serch haybales it give you mage xp.If anyone know can you please explain with detail iam kinda new at this creating stuff so thank you.
